Arkema
Team Leader - Carelflex Catalyst Sulfiding ME & Technical Sales
Engineer
July 2017 - Present (4 years 2 months)
Dubai, United Arab Emirates
In charge of technical & commercial aspects related to thiochemicals salesmainly DMDS for catalyst sulfiding to refineries including Arkema Carelflexservices & anticoking agent for Petrochemical plants.Supervises Carelflex technicians deployed to Middle East & India.
Major sales skills:
Sales Management
Salesforce tool
Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
Miller Heiman Group Strategic Selling®
Product Development
Main duties are:
- Visit regularly main customers. maintains old references and develop new
customers in the area
- Listen to potential customers and prospects, and initiates contacts with them.
- Visit high potential customers to promote our products and services.
-supervises the technical & commercial offers to customers and the
maintenance and handling, storage and expedition of the equipment.
- Prepare sales forecast for product and service.
- Establish market analysis and perform regular benchmarking on competition.
- Inform Global Business Managers and Sales Director at HQ through regular
reporting on market evolution
- Supervise the sales process from the order till delivery of the products and
payment at due date
- Create a database competitive landscape (demand, strength & weaknesses
of competition, price benchmark, …)
- Follow-up with the local sales assistant their client’s payment’s processes.
Carelflex Service:-
- Middle-East Carelflex team leader: manages a team covering ME to promote
and perform
Carelflex service, in charge to set an action plan for team members in order
to sell, improve & perform the sulfiding operations in Middle-East mainly with
some punctual operations outside the area.
TAKREER - Abudhabi Oil Refining Co.
Process Engineer
July 2014 - July 2017 (3 years 1 month)
United Arab Emirates
Performed a variety of process engineering duties in the plant. Including
monitoring performance of plants and facilities, preparing daily performance
summary and recommending corrective actions to deal with abnormalities.
Coordinates with Operations to conduct Test Runs, tests new chemicals and
implements changes in plant operations. Providing functional assistance to
various plant personnel in test-checking alternatives, diagnosing process
and corrosion problems, and preparing technical specifications of operating
chemicals and materials. Preparing data for new projects and major revamps.
Jordan Petroleum Refinery Company Ltd.
Process Engineer
January 2009 - July 2014 (5 years 7 months)
Jordan
1. Improving the performance of process units by submitting several
calculations including mass & energy balances, equipment sizing…etc.
2. Troubleshooting the process units by analyzing data, doing the required lab
tests to reveal the root cause for any failure occurred.
Page 2 of 3
3. Preparation of chemicals specifications and participate in tendering
evaluation.
4. Correspondence with international and local companies for auditing services
for new projects and supplying the refinery with new technologies.
Worked also in operation In the following process units:
• UOP Hydrocracking Unit.
• Hydrogen Production Plant.
• Vacuum Distillation Unit.
• Nitrogen Production Plant.
• Waste Water Treatment Unit and Acid Gas Incinerator.
production of petroleum fractions within the desired specifications, as well as
ensuring safety of personnel and equipment.
2. Troubleshooting of occurring troubles such as: steam, power, instrument air

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
